amendment.description: To provide for reconciliation instructions to the Committee on Finance to reduce mandatory spending.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3100 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 57. Record Vote Number: 62.

action.text: Amendment SA 3100 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S2241-2242, S2257-2258; text: CR S2241-2242) To provide for reconciliation instructions to the Committee on Finance to reduce mandatory spending.
